summary: ebolaviruses induce lethal viral hemorrhagic fevers (VHFs) in humans and non-human primates, with exception of Reston virus (RESTV), which is not pathogenic for humans. the immune responses in non-human primates, especially naturally infected ones, have not yet been elucidated in detail.
